posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing aaa Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Hexo+Github搭建个人博客
posts.text: 之前在微信公众号上写作，发现限制太多，不能添加外链，也不能使用MarkDown，样式也是有诸多限制，索性想着

pages.text: 关于本站 这是张先生的技术手记，记录失败案例，分享成功经验。 123public staitic void main(String []args){}
